portfolio.title: Article
portfolio.description: A mission to recreate a webisite I use on my everyday life. This is a full-stack web application made with PERN stack and CRUD operations.

portfolio.title: Youtube 2.0
portfolio.description: In this project I used youtube data API to recreate a starter version of it's website with functional search box, video play and comment section.

portfolio.title: Dream Team
portfolio.description: This is a NBA fantasy website. I was able to save all teams made by users, hold some starter data for selection purposes and a trash talk section.
